title: poco a poco : Harmonize our voices?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Hey there, coming iiiiin… 
Whew～. Feels kinda weird coming into another class's room.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Oh, there she is! 
Kei-cha— Oops.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Haha…! Light O rubbing off on you?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ngh… She called you that so confidently, it just kind of stuck…! Sorry～

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
It's okay. You can call me "Kei-chan" if you want to. 
…Maybe I'll call you "Kuu-chan" while we're in the group.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
A-are you sure? It's kind of embarrassing, but… Eh, whatever. 
Ahem. So, Kei-chan. Are we good to go for practice?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: We sure are, Kuu-chan! It's a good thing they're letting us borrow an empty classroom. Should we hurry over there?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: ——Hmm! Such a lovely tune, no matter how many times I hear it. I can hardly wait to sing it. Your choice of song is much appreciated, Miracle-san.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I'm glad you like it. As for splitting up the parts… 
Is everyone okay with the groups we played rock-paper-scissors for?

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
So that's me and Mirako-senpai as the main duo… Right? 
Agh～ I- I'll try not to drag you guys down…!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Hey, I might drag you guys down too! …Actually, Kei-chan, are you sure you want to be doing the accompaniment? I know you're the only one who can play the piano, but…

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Don't worry! As long we can make the kids happy, that's all I need. I'll do everything I can to support your singing.

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: Are we done talking now? Then we should hurry up and sing. I have listened to the song a lot on x50 speed so I am completely prepared. Let's start LAAAAAA LAAAAAA!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha, I'm glad you're motivated! 
Okay. Let's give singing it together a shot.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: …It's…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: It's hard!?!?!?!?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
U-utter defeat… To think a song could lead me so astray…! 
I had completely lost track of my part halfway through…

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: That was so messy I can't even believe it. That wasn't a choir at all that was just noise. Also by the way the tempo was all over the place too. Mainly because I was going too fast.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Actually, I might've been too slow～ Ngh, I can handle this stuff at Winning Concerts, so I thought I'd be better at this～!

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: Me too… But now that I think about it, those songs don't usually split parts or harmonize like that, huh?

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: The songs we usually sing have everyone singing the main melody together… Splitting it up chorus style is really tough～

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm… 
All right.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
How about we focus on the individual parts for now? 
Everyone can learn their own part first, and we can go from there.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: I understand. Individual parts… If I may confirm, we will be using recordings of the song to practice alone, yes?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Not alone. 
After all, I need to put in the work too.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Oof…! Sorry for the wait, Dantsu!

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: Oh, don't worry…! If anything, I'm sorry for interrupting your training! I feel like I'm forcing you to follow my schedule…

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Not at all. Thanks for making time for me even though you're so busy. We might have a little post-training fatigue, but do you think we're good to go?

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: Y-yes! All ready to go…!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: ——Yeah, that was really good. Sounds like you're getting a handle on the melody! All we need now is… If you sing with a little more oomph, you'll get even better.

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: Oomph… Oh, so that's it. Since we're in a choir, I got it in my head that I didn't want to stick out too much…

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: You're being considerate for the harmony, huh? Haha, you really are a nice girl, Dantsu. But it's okay! Right now, it's just you and me. Got it?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I want to hear as much of your kind, cheerful singing as I can. 
Would you do that for me, Dantsu?

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
…! 
O-okay! I'll give it a shot…!

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: ——Now I get it. I was wondering why we were going on a walk when we're supposed to be practicing for a song and I almost suspected you were just being lazy to be honest.

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: So your plan was to get me to learn to match your tempo by walking. Well it worked you got me. Though actually I did end up going faster than you a lot anyway.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Haha. Hey, running together for a bit was pretty fun too. 
——Oh, now I remember. This park actually lets you borrow boats.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
You need a pretty good sense of rhythm to row a boat. 
I think it'll make for good practice. Want to try it out?

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: I accept. Rowing a boat together on the weekend is an absolute classic date. Let's make like a couple of lovebirds and start rowing all lovey-dovey-like right now.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Huh!? …Pff. Hahaha! 
You say some really funny stuff, huh, Light O…!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: ——Okay. So you worried too much, and started getting a little anxious, huh?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Indeed… A knight must never show her shameful side to an audience, after all… But when I started thinking that…

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
A knight… That's it! 
Durandal, I think we can use that.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Let your imagination take the wheel and build a world around you… Really immerse yourself in that world, until you're not worried about performing in front of a crowd anymore!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
I… I see? Build a world, imagination… A singing knight… 
No, that's not right. A knight would hide her identity, and disguise herself as a songstress…!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Sounds good! And maybe you can imagine you're in an opera house. And… How about this? The monarch's sitting in the royal box, watching you sing.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: They are!? To think, my liege… is listening to my song——!!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: (It's working, it's working! I can see it! The glistening of the chandelier, the elegance of the opera house, Miracle-san, the maestro on the organ! And of course——)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: (The songstress for but one night, with her liege watching over her —— ME! Ahh, on this evening, your knight shall sing for you a song of admiration!)

Laaaa～♪ 
Lalalaaaaa～♪
text_block_list.name: Durandal
K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: (She's doing great! …Reminds me of when the kids at the hospital would play pretend. Hehe. I'm glad I could help her.)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
La la!! La! 
Laaaaaaaa～♪♪♪

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Whoa… Durandal-chan keeps getting better and better. 
She's singing really well, like she's really letting loose…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Kei-chan's… she's pretty awesome, huh?
